content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in bari the case involved two parties referred to as cgcvg and cf the court ruled in favor of cgcvg ordering cf to pay them a sum of €1032914 plus legal interest the court also ordered cgcvg to pay cf a sum of €65073 plus legal interest the case revolved around the division of inheritance assets between the siblings of the deceased parents the court found that certain assets had already been divided among the siblings but there were still disputed assets including a savings account a bank policy and pension amounts cf failed to prove their exclusive entitlement to these assets leading to the court ruling in favor of cgcvg the court also addressed cfs claim for reimbursement of funeral expenses ruling that cf must reimburse cgcvg for a portion of these expenses the court concluded that the debts between the parties should be offset with cf owing cgcvg a total of €65073 the court also declared that the costs of the judgment will be offset between the parties with cf being responsible for paying twothirds of the remaining costs to cgcvg the total costs and fees amount to €240000 plus additional expenses the ruling was made on december 30 2014 in the civil sect 1 council chamber in bari
